rows.text: Great news! {{extras.customer.contact_name}} has signed their credit agreement and the finance for this order is now in place.
The 14-day cooling off period has now begun. We will send you a reminder once it has ended so that you can deliver the order and mark it as delivered on the Kanda dashboard.
If {{extras.customer.contact_name}} is paying a deposit, their tradesperson will need to collect this directly and they have been sent an email to remind them to do so.

rows.subtext: For finance queries please email Kanda at support@kanda.co.uk or call us on 0330 808 3911.
